modelDescription: ReferencedTweet is a tweet referenced by another tweet.

modelFields.description: ID is the unique identifier of the referenced Tweet. You can obtain the expanded object in includes.tweets by adding expansions=referenced_tweets.id in the request's query parameter.

Type indicates the type of relationship between this Tweet and the Tweet returned in the response: retweeted (this Tweet is a Retweet), quoted (a Retweet with comment, also known as Quoted Tweet), or replied_to (this Tweet is a reply).
